name: Potion Trouble
description:
Download the desktop version for improved graphics (available below)

Can you believe it ? You were making an awesome potion when it got very, very UNSTABLE. Quick, grab the requiered ingredients to stabilize it !

Controls: Move with Arrows or WZSD and pick ingredients up with space.

Tips: The requiered ingredients are shown at the top-right of the screen. Find them before it’s too late. You can pick up ingredients that are not needed for now, but it will make your potion even less stable.

There are 5 ingredients :

  • Goddess Tears from the cascade.
  • Toad Saliva from the toad.
  • Bouncy Mushrooms that makes you fly in the air.
  • Explosive Roots that makes your potion explode a little after a short while, usefull for getting rid of monsters.
  • Crystals that tends to spawn under your feet, some smoke on the ground will indicate their location.

You loose when you don’t get an ingredient in time, when getting stabbed by a crystal of hit by a monster.

Good luck and thanks for playing :)
